references.paper_title: RosettaAntibodyDesign (RAbD): A general framework for computational antibody design
references.reason: This paper introduces a general framework for antibody design, providing a benchmark dataset and evaluation metrics used in the current study.

references.paper_title: A compact vocabulary of paratope-epitope interactions enables predictability of antibody-antigen binding
references.reason: This paper offers insights into antibody-antigen interactions, which are crucial for understanding binding affinity, a key focus of the current research.

references.paper_title: The Rosetta All-Atom Energy Function for Macromolecular Modeling and Design
references.reason: This paper describes the Rosetta all-atom energy function, which is used for energy calculations in the current study, providing essential biophysical insights into antibody design.

references.paper_title: Unified rational protein engineering with sequence-based deep representation learning
references.reason: This study uses deep learning for protein engineering, a relevant technique applied in the current research for antibody design.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, the foundation of the diffusion model used in this paper for antibody generation.
